mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, p.point_time, p.point_reason, p.points_earned, p.usage_time, p.usage_type, IFNULL(p.total_points, 0) as total_points, c.coupon_id, c.issue_date, c.use_date, c.is_used, coup.coupon_type FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Points p ON u.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN UserCoupons c ON u.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN Coupons coup ON c.coupon_id = coup.id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY u.user_id, p.point_time, c.issue_date

SELECT u.user_id, u.name, COALESCE(SUM(p.points_earned) - SUM(p.points_used), 0) AS total_points, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN uc.is_used = FALSE THEN uc.coupon_id END), 0) AS unused_coupons FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Points p ON u.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN UserCoupons uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY u.user_id, u.name

SELECT uc.user_id, uc.coupon_id, c.coupon_type, c.coupon_image, c.coupon_points, uc.issue_date, uc.use_date, uc.is_used FROM UserCoupons uc JOIN Coupons c ON uc.coupon_id = c.id WHERE uc.user_id = #{user_id};
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(points_earned - points_used), 0) AS total_points FROM Points WHERE user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT id, user_id, point_time, point_reason, points_earned, points_used, usage_time, usage_type, (points_earned - points_used) AS total_points FROM Points WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY point_time ASC
